      Subclasses of Notes in org.mpxj 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HtmlNotes
      Represents notes formatted as RTF.
      class  ParentNotes
      Represents a note which is composed of one or more child notes.
      class  RtfNotes
      Represents notes formatted as RTF.
      class  StructuredNotes
      Represents a note which belongs to a topic.

      Retrieve an object which contains both the plain text notes and, if relevant, the original formatted version of the notes.

      Retrieve an object which contains both the plain text notes and, if relevant, the original formatted version of the notes.

      Retrieve an object which contains both the plain text notes and, if relevant, the original formatted version of the notes.
